edu.mhs.compsys.morphology

Class BinaryImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mhs.compsys.morphology.BinaryImage

  • public class BinaryImage
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for easy operations on binary images. This class is simply a datastore and is not an actual image. It can however be converted to BufferedImage via toBufferedImage;

    The representation is simply a 2d array of booleans.

    X,Y is 0,0 at the Top Left corner and increases as you go down and to the left
